msg.msgText: Start IBM MessageSight services. SYNTAX: imaserver start help imaserver start imaserver start service_name EXAMPLES: imaserver start mqconnectivity NOTES: 1. By default "imaserver start" command will start "imaserver". 2. The valid options for "service" are "imaserver", "mqconnectivity", "webui", and "plugin".

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
